EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Emailer for the members – NILL EXECUTION
EmailTemplate.subject: Ffreedom Membership Yearly Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name}
Our continuous endeavor is to help you live your dream & achieve financial freedom.
To begin with, we would like to thank you for placing your trust with us and giving us an opportunity to prepare your Personalized Financial Plan.
We have observed that you have not acted upon your Financial Plan. We would like to state that not acting on the Financial Plan is similar to not having a Financial Plan.
At this point we would like to propose a meeting where we can review the actions we can take to implement your Financial Plan. Through this session, we will also take the opportunity of gathering fresh data [in terms of goals, income flows etc.]. Post this, your Financial Plan will be restructured & we can start the implementation of the same.
We would also like to inform you that your membership fee is due. Please act upon the same, so that you continue to avail the following services:
Dedicated Financial Planner [FP] Conference calls/meetings with the FP at member’s discretion. Dedicated FP will be the single point contact & will act as the Financial coach
Restructuring of the plan, if required, due to changes in personal circumstances
Access to Member portal [www.ffreedom.in] Consolidation & Monitoring Approved Financial Plan & Action Plan will be uploaded Goal Based reports [along with other reports]
Implementation Ffreedom team will help the member to execute every single action plan
Member Update - At least once a Q
Annual review [Goal Based Reports] & Rebalancing
Other Services Monthly statements of your Financial Plan SIP & Premium reminders (through SMS & Email). Weekly update & monthly Commentary mailers
Additional Offerings [at an extra price] Estate Planning Income Tax Filing
Your Financial Planner will soon be in touch with you to take these forward and incase if you have already acted upon the same please ignore this email.
Warm Regards,
Ffreedom Team
